section.p: If you have the codeword Diamond, immediately. If not, read on.

The land is bleak and desolate. It is worked by peasants in rags, desperately poor and taxed almost into oblivion by their harsh overseers, the lords of Uttakin. You spot the occasional troop of mercenaries in the pay of the Uttakin, patrolling the area, and keeping the locals in their place (i.e. oppressed).
